name: Abomination Hero
description:
You are an abomination hunter who found its way to a crypt where the ultimate evil sleeps. Use your axe and crossbow to vanquish your enemies. You also have a copy of the Necronomicon, so strange things will happen if you die.

WASD Movement.
Aim with mouse direction.
Shoot by keeping pressed right-click
Axe Slash by pressing left-click (4 Second Cooldown)
